ask_for_email.title: Plex Share Invite
ask_for_email.message:
Please provide your Plex account email address to be invited to share, by replying to this message.
nThis request will expire in 1 hour

email_success.title: Invite Sent
email_success.message:
Check your Plex account for a friend request.
A welcome message with important information will be sent to you by private message

invalid_email.title: Invalid Email Provided
invalid_email.message: Please reply with a valid email address

email_timeout.title: Plex Invite Timeout
email_timeout.message: No valid email was provided within 1 hours, please contact a server administrator to be re-invited

email_in_use.title: Email In Use
email_in_use.message: This email is already in use by another user on this server, please contact your administrator

delete_account.title: Access delete
delete_account.message: Your access to the Plex server has been removed

database_content.title: Database content
database_content.message: Member name - Member id - Member email

welcome_message.title: Welcome !
welcome_message.message:
Welcome to **Plex**!
For any questions, you can contact me on Discord

Good viewing !

trial_in_progress.title: Preparation for trial period
trial_in_progress.message: Preparation for the trial subscription... Please wait...

end_trial.title: End of trial subscription
end_trial.message: The trial period is over. If the content has you more, you can take out a subscription.

already_tested.title: Already tested
already_tested.message: You have already tested the subscription for free. You cannot test more than once.

never_tested.title: Never tested
never_tested.message: This user never did the trial period

unauthorized.title: Unauthorized
unauthorized.message: You do not have permission to use this command. Administrator only

launch_trial.title: Launch trial period
launch_trial.message:
Launch of the trial period.
Watch your discord private messages !

not_in_db.title: Not in Database
not_in_db.message: This user is not in the database

reset_trial.title: Trial period reset
reset_trial.message: Trial period for this user has been reset

confirm_send_welcome.title: Success !
confirm_send_welcome.message: The welcome message has been sent

subscription_in_progress.title: Subscription
subscription_in_progress.message:
Subscription request taken into account.
Go to your private messages to continue!

subscription1.title: Subscription
subscription1.message: To start, you need to choose the Plex libraries you want to have access to.

subscription2.title: Subscription
subscription2.message: To take out a new subscription, click [here](https://yourDonateUrl.me)

select_lib_timeout.title: Library Select Timeout
select_lib_timeout.message: You took too long to respond. Start your subscription request again

pre_end_subscription.title: Subscription coming to an end
pre_end_subscription.message:
Your Plex subscription is about to expire in 2 days.
Renew it now to keep access.
